statements: SELECT * FROM ProjectBudgets WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, estimated_cost FROM ProjectBudgets WHERE actual_cost > 10000;
SELECT project_name, budget_status FROM ProjectBudgets WHERE estimated_cost < actual_cost;
SELECT * FROM ProjectBudgets WHERE budget_status = 'Under Budget';
SELECT project_id, actual_cost, budget_status FROM ProjectBudgets WHERE estimated_cost BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000;
SELECT * FROM ProjectBudgets WHERE estimated_cost > 10000 ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, actual_cost FROM ProjectBudgets WHERE budget_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, estimated_cost - actual_cost AS cost_difference FROM ProjectBudgets WHERE budget_status = 'Pending';
SELECT project_name, budget_status, CASE WHEN estimated_cost > actual_cost THEN 'Over budget' ELSE 'Under budget' END AS budget_status_comparison FROM ProjectBudgets;
SELECT MAX(estimated_cost) AS max_estimated_cost, MIN(actual_cost) AS min_actual_cost FROM ProjectBudgets;
SELECT * FROM project_costs;
SELECT project_name, estimated_cost FROM project_costs WHERE actual_cost > 1000;
SELECT project_name, actual_cost FROM project_costs WHERE estimated_cost < 5000 ORDER BY actual_cost DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, remaining_amount FROM project_budgets WHERE budget_amount > 10000;
SELECT project_name, budget_amount FROM project_budgets WHERE remaining_amount < budget_amount * 0.5 ORDER BY budget_amount ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, estimated_cost FROM project_costs WHERE project_id = 1
SELECT project_name, actual_cost FROM project_costs WHERE estimated_cost > 5000 ORDER BY project_name DESC
SELECT project_name, budget_amount, remaining_amount FROM project_budgets WHERE remaining_amount < budget_amount ORDER BY remaining_amount ASC
SELECT project_id, project_name, estimated_cost AS estimated FROM project_costs UNION SELECT project_id, project_name, budget_amount AS budget FROM project_budgets ORDER BY project_id
SELECT project_name, actual_cost FROM project_costs JOIN project_budgets ON project_costs.project_id = project_budgets.project_id WHERE actual_cost < budget_amount
SELECT * FROM Cost_Estimates;
SELECT project_name, estimated_cost FROM Cost_Estimates ORDER BY estimated_cost DESC;
SELECT project_name, SUM(amount_spent) AS total_expense FROM Expenses GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT * FROM Budgets WHERE total_budget > 5000;
SELECT project_name, estimate_id FROM Cost_Estimates WHERE estimated_cost BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT * FROM Budgets WHERE project_name = 'Project X';
SELECT project_name, total_budget FROM Budgets ORDER BY total_budget DESC;
SELECT project_name, amount_spent FROM Expenses WHERE expense_category = 'Travel' AND amount_spent > 1000 ORDER BY amount_spent DESC;
SELECT project_name, SUM(estimated_cost) AS total_estimated_cost FROM Cost_Estimates GROUP BY project_name ORDER BY total_estimated_cost DESC;

SELECT project_name, total_budget, estimated_cost, amount_spent FROM Budgets JOIN Cost_Estimates ON Budgets.project_name = Cost_Estimates.project_name JOIN Expenses ON Budgets.project_name = Expenses.project_name WHERE total_budget > estimated_cost + amount_spent;
SELECT project_name, total_cost FROM CostEstimates WHERE material_cost > 5000
SELECT architect_name, experience_years FROM Architects ORDER BY experience_years DESC
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE architect_id = 1
SELECT architect_id, hourly_rate FROM Architects WHERE experience_years >= 10
SELECT project_name, material_cost, labor_cost, total_cost FROM CostEstimates
SELECT project_name, total_cost FROM CostEstimates
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects
SELECT project_name, material_cost, labor_cost, total_cost FROM CostEstimates
SELECT architect_name, experience_years, hourly_rate FROM Architects
SELECT project_name, budget_amount, remaining_amount FROM Budgets
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project;
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget FROM Project WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Client ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, total_budget, remaining_budget FROM Budget;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM Project ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM Client WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT Project.project_name, Budget.total_budget FROM Project INNER JOIN Budget ON Project.project_id = Budget.project_id;

SELECT Project.project_name, ExpenseCategory.category_name, ProjectExpense.expense_amount FROM Project INNER JOIN ProjectExpense ON Project.project_id = ProjectExpense.project_id INNER JOIN ExpenseCategory ON ProjectExpense.category_id = ExpenseCategory.category_id ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
